    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search​(java.lang.String dbname,
                                                           java.lang.String colname,
                                                           java.lang.String target)
        Searches for a specific row in database. Takes the column name eg "Title" and target string "Lego Movie". Returns the entire row of details.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of the database to be accessed.
        colname - Name of the column to be searched.
        target - Target string to be found
        Returns:
        Entire row of details in ArrayList<String> format. If search finds nothing, returns null.

      • searchMultipleRow

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> searchMultipleRow​(java.lang.String dbname,
                                                                        java.lang.String colname,
                                                                        java.lang.String target)
        Searches for a specific row in database. Takes the column name eg "Title" and target string "Lego Movie". Returns the every row that matches the result
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be searched
        colname - Name of column to be searched
        target - Target string
        Returns:
        Every row that matches the result in the format ArrayList<String[]>. If no result can be found, returns null.

      • delete

        public static void delete​(java.lang.String dbname,
                          int targetRow)
        Deletes selected row in the database.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be changed.
        targetRow - Index of targeted row to be deleted.

      • rewrite

        public static void rewrite​(java.lang.String dbname,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> data)
        Rewrites entire selected database.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be changed.
        data - Data to be added to database.

      • writeToCSV

        public static void writeToCSV​(java.lang.String dbname,
                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data)
        Takes in data as List<String>. Then writes to the csv file at the bottom.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be changed.
        data - Data to be written to the database in ArrayList<String> format.

      • readCSV

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> readCSV​(java.lang.String dbname)
        Reads selected database file and returns entire contents of file in ArrayList<String[]> format.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be read.
        Returns:
        Entire contents of csv file in ArrayList<String[]> format.

      • editCSV

        public static void editCSV​(java.lang.String dbname,
                           java.lang.String targetID,
                           java.lang.String col_name,
                           java.lang.String change)
        Edits only the selected attribute in the database.
        Parameters:
        dbname - Name of database to be changed.
        targetID - Unique ID of the selected row.
        col_name - Type of attribute to be changed.
        change - New attribute to be written in.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String str)
        Adds "" to a string
        Parameters:
        str - String to be altered.
        Returns:
        Altered String
